DataElement.preferredName: Patient Home Blood Pressure Monitoring Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Confirmation Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to confirm that the patient meets the eligibility requirements for home blood pressure monitoring to allow clinical trial participation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Home Blood Pressure Monitoring Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A person's permanent place of residence._The pressure of the circulating blood against the walls of the blood vessels._The act of observing something (and sometimes keeping a record of it)._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Home Blood Pressure Monitoring Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: A person's permanent place of residence.:The pressure of the circulating blood against the walls of the blood vessels.:The act of observing something (and sometimes keeping a record of it).:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: A person's permanent place of residence.
The pressure of the circulating blood against the walls of the blood vessels.
The act of observing something (and sometimes keeping a record of it).
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 6/10/20 tmt versioned to 2.0 for changes to Long and Short names.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Patient must agree to comply
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient must agree to comply with performing home blood pressure monitoring using an Omron BP HEM 9200 Series cuff in the clinic or Omron 7250786N oscillometric monitor at home, or equivalent models as outlined in the protocol.

ReferenceDocuments.name: EAQ191 - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient must agree to comply with performing home blood pressure monitoring using an Omron7250 oscillometric monitor at home, or equivalent models as outlined in the protocol (See Appendix III and IV).
